A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie is entertaining and fun. However\, it has many flaws. It has a lot going on but it accomplishes nothing in the end. 
Pros:
- Stunning cinematography 
- Great acting for the most part

Cons: 
- Finn and Rose subplot leads to nothing and is unnecessary\, and this is like half of the movie
- Only main character that had character development was Poe. And even then it was minimum
- Some major events in the movie are just there to create drama and shock\, not to add substance to the story
- Unnecessary amount of comedy
